attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With houseprices and general GBP value increasing, the government should radically adjust the level at which individuals must pay inheritance tax for any financial benefits gained via a death of a partner, relative or other individual.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "modernise Inheritance Tax."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13997.asp
